EnemyInfo.Name: Walking Space Pirate (Pink)
EnemyInfo.Description: Space Pirate that walks back and forth and can shoot. The Special->Extended Tilemap should be True.

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Which direction to be initially facing.

Property.Name: Blocks
Property.Description: If enabled, the enemy will perform a blocking animation when shot. This does not affect vulnerability or damage.

Property.Name: Travel Range
Property.Description: Distance to travel in both directions. The enemy will turn around once reaching the boundry.
